NoEnvFields: Nu există opțiuni specifice pentru acest environment

docker.name: Docker
docker.BindingsHint: Montați căile de la host în containerul Docker
docker.PortBindingsHint: Definiți ce port Docker ar trebui să expună pe container

host.name: Host
host.DisableUnshareHint: Unshare attempts to isolate servers to prevent them from touching other servers, SkyPanels or the host systems files. Disabling this is a security risk unless all entities interacting with this server are fully trusted.
host.MountsHint: Grant this server access to specific files and directories on the host system without disabling Unshare completely. The server directory and necessary programs and files are always included.
